author: David Weigel
title: The Trailer: The Empire Strikes Back: A wave of PAC money buries left-wing Democrats

sentence: That Pennsylvania candidate, state Senator Doug Mastriano, is widely seen as a terrible general election candidate so much so that the Cook Report and other neutral rating groups shifted the race from toss-up to leans Democratic after the primary results were in.
author: Jonathan Bernstein
title: Looking for Midterm Drama on the Democratic Side? Sorry
